upperSection.Cheap_flights_para: Cheap Prices Worldwide, Just One Simple Search

section2.Search_simply_para: Simplify your travel planning with effortless searches. Find your perfect flights in just a few clicks.
section2.Comparison_para: Compare options side by side to discover the best deals. Book with confidence, knowing you've made the right choice.
section2.Maximize_Savings_para: Unlock savings that make every journey affordable. Travel smarter and keep more in your pocket.

hotel_search.question: How do I search for hotels on Flay Arzan?
hotel_search.answer: Simply enter your destination, travel dates, and the number of guests in our search bar. Our platform will then display a wide range of hotel options suited to your preferences, including budget-friendly, mid-range, and luxury choices, ensuring you find the ideal place for your stay.

filter_amenities.question: Can I filter hotel search results by amenities?
filter_amenities.answer: Yes, our advanced filtering system allows you to customise your search according to your specific needs. You can filter by amenities such as WiFi, swimming pool, car park, and many more.

book_hotel.question: Can I book a hotel through Flay Arzan?
book_hotel.answer: Yes, you can book directly through our platform. We partner with trusted hotels to provide you with a secure and transparent booking process.

hotel_availability.question: How accurate is the hotel availability on your platform?
hotel_availability.answer: We update availability in real-time through direct synchronisation with our hotel partners, ensuring accurate information.

customer_reviews.question: Can I see customer reviews for the hotels listed?
customer_reviews.answer: Yes, you can read authentic reviews from other travellers for each hotel, helping you make an informed decision.

hidden_fees.question: Are there any hidden fees when I book a hotel?
hidden_fees.answer: No, we display all fees transparently. The final price includes all mandatory taxes and charges.

cancel_modify.question: Can I cancel or modify my hotel booking?
cancel_modify.answer: Cancellation and modification policies vary by hotel. Specific conditions are clearly indicated before booking.

hotel_suitability.question: How do I know if a hotel is right for my needs?
hotel_suitability.answer: Check the detailed descriptions, photos, amenities, and customer reviews to assess if the hotel meets your expectations.

special_deals.question: Do you offer any special deals or discounts on hotels?
special_deals.answer: Yes, we regularly offer special deals and exclusive discounts. Subscribe to our newsletter to learn about the best offers.

direct_booking.question: Do I book my hotel directly through Flay Arzan?
direct_booking.answer: Yes, all bookings are made directly through our platform, ensuring a secure process and dedicated customer service.

PrivacyPolicypage.heading: Information Collection
PrivacyPolicypage.para: Welcome to Fly Arzan! We are a search engine for flights, hotels, and car rentals. Your privacy is important to us, and we are committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your datawhen you use our website
PrivacyPolicypage.text1: Fly Arzan collects minimal user information to enhance your experience. The only personal data we collect is:
PrivacyPolicypage.text3: Only if you voluntarily provide it to receive notifications about offers, promotions, and updates.
PrivacyPolicypage.text5: Payment information (we redirect you to third-party booking platforms).
PrivacyPolicypage.text9: Your email address (if provided) will be used solely for:
PrivacyPolicypage.text11: Notifying you about new features or updates on Fly Arzan.
PrivacyPolicypage.text12: Responding to customer inquiries (if you contact us).
PrivacyPolicypage.text13: We will never sell, rent, or share your email with third parties for marketing purposes without your explicit consent.
PrivacyPolicypage.text15: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your information, including
PrivacyPolicypage.text17: Secure storage of email addresses in protected databases.
PrivacyPolicypage.text18: Regular security audits to prevent unauthorized access.
PrivacyPolicypage.text19: Despite our efforts, no online platform can guarantee 100% security. We encourage users to be cautious when sharing personal information online.
PrivacyPolicypage.text21: Fly Arzan works with third-party service providers (e.g., airlines, hotels, car rental agencies) to deliver search results. When you click on a booking link, you will be redirected to their websites, which have their own privacy policies. We do not control or store:
PrivacyPolicypage.text24: Personal data entered on third-party sites.
PrivacyPolicypage.text26: Fly Arzan uses cookies and similar tracking technologies to:
PrivacyPolicypage.text29: Analyze user behavior (e.g., via Google Analytics) to enhance performance.
PrivacyPolicypage.text30: You can disable cookies in your browser settings, but some features may not work properly.
PrivacyPolicypage.text33: Access – Request details of the data we hold about you.
PrivacyPolicypage.text34: Delete – Ask us to remove your email from our database.
PrivacyPolicypage.text35: Unsubscribe – Opt out of marketing emails at any time via the Unsubscribe link in emails.
PrivacyPolicypage.text37: We may update this Privacy Policy occasionally. Any changes will be posted here, and we encourage you to review it periodically.
PrivacyPolicypage.text39: For questions, data requests, or concerns about privacy, please contact us at:
PrivacyPolicypage.text42: Thank you for trusting Fly Arzan for your travel searches!

AboutUs.heading: About Us
AboutUs.text1: At Fly Arzan, we make it easy to find the best deals on flights, hotels, and car rentals —all in one place.
AboutUs.text2: We’re not a booking site — we’re your travel search buddy. Just tell us where you want to go, and we’ll help you compare prices from different airlines, hotels, and rental companies so you can pick what works best for you (and your wallet).
AboutUs.text3: The name “Arzan” means affordable, and that’s our goal: helping you travel smarter and cheaper without the stress.
AboutUs.text4: We only collect your email address (if you want updates on offers and deals), and we’ll never spam you or share your info
AboutUs.text5: Thanks for flying smart with Fly Arzan. Let’s plan something amazing together.

AboutUssec1.heading: The perfect vacation comes true with our Travel Agency.
AboutUssec1.text1: Easily compare flights, hotels, and car rentals – all in one place, so you can find the best deals and make your dream trip a reality.
AboutUssec1.text2: Access to domestic and international flights with competitive fares. Easy search and comparison to find the best deals for your schedule.
AboutUssec1.text3: Curated lists of hotels, from budget-friendly to luxury stays. Filters to help you choose based on location, amenities, and price.
AboutUssec1.text4: Reliable vehicles for self-drive or chauffeur-driven options. Flexible rental plans for business, leisure, or group travel.

AboutUssec2.text1: We collaborate with leading travel providers to give you access to a wide range of services.
AboutUssec2.text2: Our website and app are designed to provide a seamless booking experience.
AboutUssec2.text3: Our team is here to assist you via email with any travel inquiries.

AboutUssec3.heading: Perfect Vacation come True
AboutUssec3.para: Fly Arzan was created with the goal of making travel planning easier and more affordable.We’ve worked hard to bring together the best options for flights, hotels, and car rentals, so travellers can find what they need all in one place. Over time, we’ve built strong relationships with top providers to offer great deals and a seamless experience to our customers.
AboutUssec3.text1: We collaborate with leading travel providers to give you access to a wide range of services.
AboutUssec3.text2: Currently not offering any services.  Our team is here to assist you via email with any travel inquiries.

Articlestitale.para1: Seen from the peak of Sugarloaf Mountain, Rio is undoubtedly a Marvelous City. There are many good times to make the ascent, but sunset on a clear day is the most rewarding. Two cable cars connect to the summit, 395 meters above Rio. At the top, the city unfolds beneath you, with Corcovado Mountain and Christ the Redeemer off to the west, and Copacabana Beach to the south.
Articlestitale.para2: The Expiatory Temple of the Holy Family (Sagrada Família) is considered to be the symbol of Barcelona by many residents, and the one place you shouldn’t miss when you visit the Catalan capital.
Articlestitale.para3: The Hagia Sophia (officially the Hagia Sophia Grand Mosque) is one of the Byzantine Empire’s surviving architectural marvels. Located in the heart of Istanbul’s historic center, this sacred building remains – even today – an important symbol of power.

ContactUspage.heading: Contact Us
ContactUspage.text1: If you’re interested in advertising, promotions, partnerships, or just want to share feedback, please use the contact form below. Simply fill out your name, email, subject, and leave your message in the comments section — our team will review it and get back to you as soon as possible.
ContactUspage.para8: We aim to respond to all inquiries during our business hours

faq1.question: How do I search for hotels on your website?
faq1.answer: Enter your destination, travel dates, and the number of guests to instantly browse available hotels from multiple providers in one place.

faq2.question: Can I book a hotel directly on your platform?
faq2.answer: No, we are a comparison site. Once you select a hotel, we’ll redirect you to the booking provider’s site to finalize your reservation.

faq3.question: Are the hotel prices shown per person or per room?
faq3.answer: Prices are typically displayed per room, but details like number of guests and included services are available on the provider's page.

faq4.question: Do your listings include taxes and fees?
faq4.answer: Some providers include taxes and fees in the total price, while others display them atcheckout. We recommend reviewing this on the final booking page.

faq5.question: How can I find hotels with free cancellation?
faq5.answer: Use the “Free Cancellation” filter in your search results to view properties that offer flexible cancellation policies

faq6.question: Can I filter hotels by amenities like Wi-Fi, breakfast, or pool?
faq6.answer: Yes, you can refine your search with filters such as free Wi-Fi, breakfast included, swimming pool, pet-friendly, and more

faq7.question: Do you show both budget and luxury hotels?
faq7.answer: Yes, we list accommodations across all price ranges—from hostels and guesthouses to boutique hotels and luxury resorts.

faq8.question: Can I view hotel photos and reviews before booking?
faq8.answer: Absolutely. You can view detailed photos, star ratings, and verified guest reviews for each hotel before making a decision

faq9.question: How do I know if a hotel is available for my dates?
faq9.answer: Availability is updated in real-time based on your selected travel dates. Only rooms that are open for booking will be shown

faq10.question: Can I search for accommodations like apartments or villas?
faq10.answer: Yes, we include alternative accommodations such as serviced apartments, vacation homes, and villas in your search results.

faq11.question: Do hotel listings show exact locations on a map?
faq11.answer: Yes, you can view hotel locations on a map to check proximity to landmarks, transport hubs, or neighborhoods

faq12.question: How do I book multiple rooms for a group?
faq12.answer: You can select the number of rooms needed during your search and view pricing based on group size.

faq13.question: What should I do if I want to make changes to my hotel booking?
faq13.answer: Please contact the hotel or booking provider directly to make any changes, as all bookings are handled through their platforms.

faq14.question: Can I earn rewards or loyalty points with hotel bookings?
faq14.answer: That depends on the booking provider. Some platforms allow you to earn loyalty points or apply discounts if you’re a member

faq15.question: Is breakfast included in the hotel price?
faq15.answer: Some listings include breakfast, while others do not. You’ll see this information clearly displayed before being redirected to the provider’s site

faq1.question: How do I search for car rentals?
faq1.answer: Enter your pickup location, dates, and times to instantly compare rental offers from various companies in one place

faq2.question: Can I book a rental car directly on your platform?
faq2.answer: No, we redirect you to the rental agency or booking partner’s website where you can complete your reservation.

faq3.question: Do I need a credit card to rent a car?
faq3.answer: Most rental companies require a credit card for the security deposit and booking. Check the rental conditions on the provider's site for specifics

faq4.question: Can I rent a car without a driver's license?
faq4.answer: No, a valid driver’s license is required for all rentals. Some companies also require you to have held it for at least one year

faq5.question: Are insurance and taxes included in the car rental price?
faq5.answer: Some providers include basic insurance and taxes, while others offer them as add-ons. Full details are available on the checkout page

faq6.question: What types of cars can I rent?
faq6.answer: You can choose from a wide range including economy, compact, SUVs, luxury, and vans based on your travel needs

faq7.question: Can I pick up the car in one city and return it in another?
faq7.answer: Yes, this is called a one-way rental. Use the appropriate option during your search. Extra fees may apply depending on the route.

faq8.question: Are there any age restrictions for renting a car?
faq8.answer: Most companies require drivers to be at least 21, and surcharges may apply for those under 25. Check the provider’s terms for exact rules

faq9.question: Do you offer filters like automatic vs manual transmission?
faq9.answer: Yes, you can filter search results by transmission type, fuel policy, passenger capacity, and more.

faq10.question: Can I add a second driver to my rental?
faq10.answer: Many providers allow additional drivers for an extra fee. Be sure to include this option when completing your booking on the partner site

faq11.question: Is fuel included in the car rental price?
faq11.answer: Usually not. Most rentals follow a full-to-full fuel policy, meaning you return the car with the same fuel level it had at pickup.

faq12.question: Can I cancel or modify my car rental booking?
faq12.answer: That depends on the provider’s policy. Most offer free cancellation within a specific window. Details are provided on their site.

faq13.question: What documents do I need when picking up the car?
faq13.answer: You typically need a driver’s license, a credit card, and sometimes a booking confirmation or ID. Always check in advance with the rental company.

faq14.question: Can I rent a car at the airport?
faq14.answer: Yes, our platform shows options for airport pickups, including on-site and shuttle-based rentals for added convenience.

faq15.question: What happens if my flight is delayed, and I miss the pickup time?
faq15.answer: Most rental companies allow a grace period. However, it’s best to inform them directly if you anticipate delays, especially for after-hours pickups.

faq1.question: Do I make any payments on your website?
faq1.answer: No, we do not process any transactions. Once you select a flight, hotel, or car rental, you’ll be redirected to the provider’s website to complete your booking and payment.

faq2.question: What payment methods can I use with travel providers?
faq2.answer: Most providers accept major credit and debit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express), and many also support PayPal, Apple Pay, or regional payment options.

faq3.question: Is it safe to enter my payment details on the booking site?
faq3.answer: Yes. We only partner with trusted travel providers who use secure, encrypted paymentgateways to protect your personal and financial information.

faq4.question: Are there any hidden charges or booking fees from your side?
faq4.answer: No, our platform is completely free to use. You are never charged any extra fees by us— your payment goes directly to the travel provider

faq5.question: Will I be charged in my local currency?
faq5.answer: That depends on the provider. Many offers currency conversion and allow you to view andpay in your local currency at checkout.

faq6.question: Can I split the payment across multiple cards or people?
faq6.answer: Most providers require full payment from a single cardholder. For group bookings or shared costs, you may need to arrange payment separately.

faq7.question: Do I need to pay the full amount upfront?
faq7.answer: It depends on the provider and the type of service. Some offer 'pay later' or deposit options, while others require full payment at the time of booking.

faq8.question: What happens if my payment fails on the provider’s site?
faq8.answer: If a payment fails, you’ll typically receive a prompt to try again or use a different method. You can also contact the provider’s support team for assistance.

faq9.question: Can I get a refund if I cancel my booking?
faq9.answer: Refund policies vary by provider and service type. Some offer full refunds within a time window, while others may charge a cancellation fee. Always check the terms before booking.

faq10.question: Will I receive a payment confirmation or invoice?
faq10.answer: Yes. Once your payment is completed on the provider’s site, you will receive a confirmation email and invoice directly from them

Faqpage.heading: Having Question About Us? We Have  Just The Right Answers For You.
Faqpage.text1: Welcome to our FAQ section, where we’ve answered the most common questions to help you plan and book your journey with confidence. Whether you're searching for flights, hotels, or car rentals, you’ll find clear and helpful answers about how our travel search engine works. Explore each category below to learn more and make informed travel decisions with ease.

faq1.question: How do I search for flights on your website?
faq1.answer: Simply enter your departure city, destination, travel dates, and number of passengers. Our system will instantly search multiple airlines and travel providers to show you the best available options.

faq2.question: Can I book a flight directly on your website?
faq2.answer: No, we are a travel search engine. Once you find a flight that suits your needs, we’ll redirect you to the airline or travel agency’s website to complete your booking.

faq3.question: Are the flight prices shown in real-time?
faq3.answer: Yes, our platform pulls real-time data from providers to ensure you see the latest prices and availability. However, final confirmation happens on the provider's site.

faq4.question: Do your flight prices include taxes and fees?
faq4.answer: Most prices include basic taxes and fees, but optional extras like baggage, meals, or seat selection may cost more and are shown on the booking provider’s site.

faq5.question: Can I search for one-way, round-trip, or multi-city flights?
faq5.answer: Absolutely. You can choose your preferred trip type before starting your search and even add multiple destinations for a customized itinerary

faq6.question: Do you offer flexible date search options?
faq6.answer: Yes, our flexible date feature allows you to see the cheapest flights within a range of days around your chosen departure and return dates

faq7.question: How can I filter flights by airline, price, or duration?
faq7.answer: After searching, use our filters to narrow down results by airline, price range, number of stops, travel time, and more

faq8.question: Can I sort flights by shortest travel time or lowest price?
faq8.answer: Yes, you can easily sort results to find the fastest route, cheapest fare, or most convenientdeparture times.

faq9.question: Do you show both budget and full-service airlines?
faq9.answer: Yes, we include results from major carriers, budget airlines, and online travel agencies to give you a complete picture of your options.

faq10.question: Can I book international and domestic flights?
faq10.answer: Yes, we support searches for both domestic and international routes across a wide rangeof destinations and airlines.

faq11.question: Can I set flight price alerts?
faq11.answer: We offer a price alert feature where you can subscribe to receive notifications when fares for a selected route drop.

faq12.question: Why does the price sometimes change when I click to book?
faq12.answer: Airline prices fluctuate constantly based on demand and availability. If the fare changes, it’s usually updated in real time by the provider.

faq13.question: How do I know if baggage is included in the flight price?
faq13.answer: Each listing indicates whether checked or cabin baggage is included, and full details are available on the booking partner’s site.

faq14.question: What should I do if I have issues with my flight booking?
faq14.answer: Since the booking is completed on the airline or agent's site, you’ll need to contact them directly for help with changes, cancellations, or refunds.

faq15.question: Can I book flights for groups or large families?
faq15.answer: Yes, you can search for flights for up to 9 passengers. For larger groups, we recommend contacting the airline or travel provider directly.
